result.eng: Every member (except elected members) can be reappointed.
result.ga: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadh
result.orig: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadh
result.html: Féadfar comhalta seachas comhalta tofa a athcheapadhEvery member (except elected members) can be reappointed.
result.ponchtml: Féadfar coṁalta seaċas coṁalta tofa a aṫċeapaḋEvery member (except elected members) can be reappointed.

result.eng: They cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.
result.ga: Ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-srianta
result.orig: Ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-srianta
result.html: Ní féidir iad a dhíbirt ach amháin i gcúinsí an-sriantaThey cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir iad a ḋíbirt aċ aṁáin i gcúinsí an-sriantaThey cannot be expelled, except in very limited circumstances.

result.eng: A pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ga: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.orig: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáil
result.html: Níl cead pinn luaidhe a úsáid ach amháin chun nótaí a thógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.
result.ponchtml: Níl cead pinn luaiḋe a úsáid aċ aṁáin ċun nótaí a ṫógáilA pencil is not allowed, except to take notes.

result.eng: He isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ga: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.orig: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.html: Níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ponchtml: Níl suim aige in aon rud seaċas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: Is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: Do you get any exercise at all? I don't - except throwing darts.
result.ga: An ndéanann tú aclaíocht ar bith Ní dhéanann - ach amháin bheith ag caitheamh saighead
result.orig: An ndéanann tú aclaíocht ar bith Ní dhéanann - ach amháin bheith ag caitheamh saighead
result.html: An ndéanann tú aclaíocht ar bith Ní dhéanann - ach amháin bheith ag caitheamh saigheadDo you get any exercise at all? I don't - except throwing darts.
result.ponchtml: An ndéanann tú aclaíoċt ar biṫ Ní ḋéanann - aċ aṁáin ḃeiṫ ag caiṫeaṁ saiġeadDo you get any exercise at all? I don't - except throwing darts.
